sentences.en: Drowsy warmth was streaming down from the upper floor.
sentences.cn: 倦人的热气从楼上散布下来.

sentences.en: Exhaust fumes made him drowsy and brought on a headache.
sentences.cn: 废气把他熏得昏昏沉沉,还引起了头疼.

sentences.en: He felt pleasantly drowsy and had to fight off the urge to sleep.
sentences.cn: 他感觉昏昏欲睡，只好尽量克制睡意。

sentences.en: He had been feeling drowsy, the effect of an unusually heavy meal.
sentences.cn: 他一直感到昏昏沉沉的，这是吃了一顿超级大餐的结果。

sentences.en: He was still drowsy from the warmth of his sleep.
sentences.cn: 他刚离开被窝,还迷迷糊糊的.

sentences.en: I feel drowsy after lunch every day.
sentences.cn: 每天午饭后我就想睡觉.

sentences.en: I felt dopey and drowsy after the operation.
sentences.cn: 手术后我感到迷迷糊糊，昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: I'd just woken up and was still drowsy.
In about five minutes his valet appeared , half - dressed and looking very drowsy.
sentences.cn: 大约过了五分钟他的仆人来了.衣冠不整, 而且睡眼惺松.

sentences.en: Mr. Huang began to feel drowsy again.
sentences.cn: 老黄两眼皮又迷糊起来了.

sentences.en: Now the drowsy life of the beachboy drifted from day to day.
sentences.cn: 海滩仔的懒洋洋的生活日复一日.

sentences.en: She purred, her glowing dark eyes drowsy and grateful.
sentences.cn: 她高兴地咕哝了一声, 闪亮的黑眼睛里充满了温柔感激之情.

sentences.en: She would not be very cold now, just drowsy.
sentences.cn: 这时她兴许不会感到很冷, 只是发困.

sentences.en: The drug can make you drowsy.
sentences.cn: 这种药会让人昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: The tablets may make you feel drowsy.
sentences.cn: 这药片可能会使你昏昏欲睡。

sentences.en: Within five minutes, he was dressed and downstairs feeling sore and drowsy.
sentences.cn: 不到五分钟, 他就穿起衣服下楼去了,浑身觉得酸痛和困倦.

words.tran_cn: 使昏昏欲睡；昏昏沉沉地消磨（时光）

trans.tran_cn: 昏昏欲睡的，沉寂的，催眠的，呆滞的
